name: Fall 2020 Brand Identity Graphic Design Showcase
description:
This Fall 2020 semester, Katrina Romulo, Mimi Liu and I had the chance to teach a Pass / No pass branding design class in UC Berkeley! Check our 23 students' work in this gallery.


Over the semester, students have been taught brand strategy and graphic design concepts, and applied them to their self-created brand. They used Figma, Adobe CC various other software to create their brands. They also engaged in weekly critiques and collaborated on design challenges, culminating to a final presentation.


If you are interested in applying or seeing our class content/syllabus, head over to our website: http://bigddecal.com.
